sentences.en: a splendid cathedral
sentences.cn: 宏伟的大教堂

sentences.en: a splendid feast of turkey with all the trimmings
sentences.cn: 备有各种配料的丰盛火鸡大餐

sentences.en: a splendid idea
sentences.cn: 很妙的主意

sentences.en: a splendid opportunity
sentences.cn: 绝佳的机会

sentences.en: All the rooms have splendid views.
sentences.cn: 所有的房间都能看到漂亮的景致。

sentences.en: Besides the acting being true to life, the singing was splendid.
sentences.cn: 不但动作十分逼真, 演唱也极为出色.

sentences.en: He got a splendid present for her.
sentences.cn: 他送她一件极好的礼物.

sentences.en: If you're lucky, a splendid golden eagle may soar into view.
sentences.cn: 幸运的话，会有一只光彩夺目的金雕飞入你的视野。

sentences.en: It was splendid of you to make the offer.
sentences.cn: 你提的这个建议太好了.

sentences.en: Our house has got a splendid view across to the Cotswolds.
sentences.cn: 从我们的房子里向外望去，景色宜人，一直能看到科茨沃尔德丘陵。

sentences.en: She was attended by servants in splendid livery and powdered wigs.
sentences.cn: 她由穿着华丽制服、头戴扑粉假发的仆人们伺候着。

sentences.en: The acre of garden is host to a splendid bank of rhododendrons.
sentences.cn: 一英亩见方的花园生长出一大片绚烂的杜鹃花.

sentences.en: The book includes a wealth of splendid photographs.
sentences.cn: 该书中有大量精彩的照片。

sentences.en: The drawing room is particularly notable for its splendid oak panelling.
sentences.cn: 客厅富丽堂皇的橡木镶板特别引人注目.

sentences.en: The house commanded some splendid views of Delaware Bay.
sentences.cn: 从这座房子可以俯瞰到特拉华湾壮丽的景致。

sentences.en: The lower strings contribute a splendid richness of sonority.
sentences.cn: 下弦能够产生雄壮浑厚的音响效果。

sentences.en: The nobles of Florence built splendid palaces.
sentences.cn: 佛罗伦萨的贵族建造了许多雄伟的建筑物.

sentences.en: The splendid evening glow in the sky means another fine day tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 灿烂的晚霞预示明天又是好天气.

sentences.en: The staff are doing a splendid job.
sentences.cn: 员工们干得非常棒。

sentences.en: the stone stands &B{in splendid isolation} near the moorland road.
sentences.cn: 这块石头孑然傲立于沼地公路的近旁。

sentences.en: What a splendid idea!
sentences.cn: 这主意妙极了！
